Fredericton offers access to professional antique appraisal services through local specialists and regional experts serving New Brunswick’s capital city:

---

## Overview  
Antique appraisal services cover insurance valuations, estate planning/donation assessments (**Liz Isaac**, **Mario Brideau**[1]), machinery/equipment valuations (**Jardine Auctioneers**[5]), and fine art authentication (**Kelly Juhasz**[6]). Certifications range from CPA membership[1] to ISA accreditation[6].

---

## Antique Appraiser Directory  

### **Liz Isaac Appraisals**  
- *Specialty*: Art (Canadian/NB artists), period furniture[1], sterling silver/jewelry[1].  
- *Certification*: Canadian Professional Appraiser (CPA)[1].  
- *Contact*: lizisaacappraisals@gmail.com | Cell: +1(506)333-1058[1].  

### **Mario Brideau Appraisals**  
- *Specialty*: Fine art/pottery[3][4][7][8] , New Brunswick glassware.  
- *Certification*：CPA member since at least May2024（based on active listings）． 
– Contact：mariobrideau@yahoo.com | Tel:+１(506)642–900４／Cell:+１(506）651–031８［１］． 

### **Jardine Auctioneers Inc.**（Since198２） 
– Specialty：Commercial equipment/machinery valuation［５］．Notable clients include fleet managers nationwide． 
– Service Area：Frederiction-based，national reach［５］．
－Contact：(+１)506－454－8980｜info@jardineaution.ca｜139-acre facility，Frederiction,NB［５］．

### **Kelly Juhasz（Fine Art Appraisal＆Services）**
－Accreditation：ISA Private Client Services Group；president，ISA Canada Chapter［６］．
－Specialty：High-value fine art／archives；expert witness reports．
－Service Area：National coverage via remote consultations．
―Contact：（via website www.finｅartappraｉsandservices.com ）｜LinkedIn profile linkedin.com/in/kellyjuhasz-appraiser ． 

---

## Service Areas＆Pricing
Most offer onsite evaluations within southern NB cities（SaintJohn→Frederiction≈100km），with travel fees applied beyond metro zones．Typical rates：
‐ Hourly fees:$150-$300＋travel costs（commonfor insurance／estate reports）．
‐ Flat fees per item:$75-$500＋GST/HST depending complexity．

---

## Business Hours＆Availability
Appointments typically required：
‐ Liz/Mario：[Call ahead](+15063331058/+15066510318)；flexible weekday slots reported by clients〔unverified〕〔¹〕․
‐JardinｅAuctioneerｓMon-Fri９AM – ４PM EST〔⁵〕․

*(Note:Pricing/hours sourced from industry standards due limited explicit data)*
